_header: Ye are to blame to set your heart so sore

CULFf16.Transcription:
Ye are to blame to sette yowre hert so sore seþyn þat ye
                    wete that hyt rekeurles To encrece yowre payne more & more syn
                    þat ye wete þat sche ys merceles
CULFf16.Facsimiles:
Beadle,  Richard,  and  Alfred E. B. Owen.  
             The Findern Manuscript: Cambridge University Library MS. F.1.6.
         London: Scolar Press, 1977.
CULFf16.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Findern Anthology.” 
             PMLA
         69 (1954): 610-42: 632.
